mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, c.category_name AS categoryName, c.is_notice AS isNotice, b.board_name AS boardName FROM board b JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post p WHERE p.board_id = b.board_id) DESC LIMIT 7

SELECT banner_id, banner_name, image_url, link_url, display_yn, seq, start_date, end_date, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at FROM banner WHERE display_yn = 1 AND NOW() BETWEEN start_date AND end_date ORDER BY seq
